name: Lazy Lifeguard
description:
Save Struggling Swimmers without moving a muscle by firing life rings, shark repellent and jellyfish sting remedies from your Lifeguard Cannon. You have 90 seconds to aim for a personal high score. Extra swimmers will be carried by the fast ocean currents in the last 30 seconds!

Controls

Left Click - Select Projectile
A - Aim Cannon Left
D - Aim Cannon Right
Hold Space - Charge Cannon
Release Space - Fire Cannon

Credits

Game concept, design and development by Rhydian Carter.

Produced for Leeds Beckett University as part of BSc (Hons) Games Design, Level 6, "Advanced Game Systems and Programming" Module.

Music Title

"Happy Bee - Surf" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
